### Canonical Compliance (Mandatory)

- [ ] All user-facing links point **exclusively** to https://quantum-pi-forge-fixed.vercel.app/
- [ ] No references to `quantumpiforge.com` as an active platform
- [ ] No references to deprecated GitHub Pages or alternate URLs
- [ ] Documentation updates align with [CANONICAL_PLATFORM_DECLARATION.md](../blob/main/CANONICAL_PLATFORM_DECLARATION.md)
- [ ] If adding new external links or deployments, justify why they do not conflict with the single front door

**PRs failing this checklist will be marked `non-canonical` and closed until corrected.**
